summary.span: 提供批处理指定数目输入的数据流块，这些输入提供给一个或多个目标，可能属于不同类型。

span.span: Provides a dataflow block that batches a specified number of inputs of potentially differing types provided to one or more of its targets.

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其不应该生成任何更多的消息也不应使用任何更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the that it should not accept nor produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其任务将进入最终状态之后它已处理所有以前可用的数据。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state after it has processed all previously available data. 将不会阻止等待完成发生，而是将发起的请求; 但要等待的时间完成，发生，可能使用任务。 will not block waiting for completion to occur, but rather will initiate the request; to wait for completion to occur, the task may be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion { get; }
.property instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task Completion
Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 ，其表示数据流块的操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块视为已完成时它当前不在处理一条消息，当它具有保证不会处理更多消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 返回关联的块完成时将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 它将转换为状态在阻塞完成其处理成功根据数据流块时定义的语义，它将转换为时数据流块都有的状态完成处理过早地由于未经处理的异常，并且它将转换为时数据流块完成提前由于接收取消请求的处理状态。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block’s defined semantics, it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务在完成时处于状态，其`Exception`属性将返回包含导致失败的块的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property will return an containing the one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail.

summary.span: 导致 在 状态下完成。

span.span: Causes the to complete in a state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后已在数据流块上调用，将完成该块，并将其任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete, and its task will enter a final state. 出错块，作为与取消块，导致缓冲的消息 （未处理的输入的消息，以及 unoffered 的输出消息） 会丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会阻止等待要提供项的源。This method does not block waiting for the source to provide an item. 它将元素可用，在检查的元素之后返回。It will return after checking for an element, whether or not an element was available.
